title: Such clubbing can be allowed for the schemes falling within ‘Island City’ with schemes in ‘Island City’ and within ‘Western Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ with schemes in ‘Western Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ and within ‘Eastern Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ with schemes in ‘Eastern Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’
clause_text: Such clubbing can be allowed for the schemes falling within ‘Island City’ with schemes in ‘Island City’ and within ‘Western Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ with schemes in ‘Western Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ and within ‘Eastern Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ with schemes in ‘Eastern Suburbs & Extended Suburbs’ . Provided that such clubbing will also be allowed in adjoining ward irrespective of location.
section: Payments to be made to SRA and Instalments:
